GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v6.0.9
GSD.description:
bpftool: Fix NULL pointer dereference when pin {PROG, MAP, LINK} without FILE

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit da5161ba94c5e9182c301dd4f09c94f715c068bd, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 75a1e792c335b5c6d7fdb1014da47aeb64c5944f. For more details please see the references link.
